Reviews.Title: “Better than I initially expected”

Reviews.Content: plane landing little rock memphis airport closed storm passed 40minute connection called husband checked hotels near airport found low price decent ratings plane memphis reopened booked hotel envisioning mad scramble memphis bit dismayed originally arrived lobby locked neighborhood comfortable wireless internet near lobby minimal breakfast 5 theres shuttle airport booked reduced rate line airline ok
